document.full_text: serbia met a key obligation to a u.n. war crimes tribunal by arresting bosnian serb commander ratko mladic but still needs to explain why it took so long, the court's chief prosecutor said on monday.
document.title: serbia met obligation by nabbing mladic: prosecutor
lines_and_colors: serbia met a key obligation to a u.n. war crimes tribunal by arresting bosnian serb commander ratko mladic but still needs to explain why it took so long, the court's chief prosecutor said on monday.
